__e: But the clouds and the breeze, the way day turns to night, all of it's created in the control room to maintain a balance in the system and make the lab seem more real for the residence.
It took me a while to get my balance again and I don't want to lose that, I don't want to give it up.
You have to find a balance, and... you do that better than most of us.
I'd do it, but I have school and work and I value my sanity.
Samantha, for your sake, for Santa's sake and for the sake of my sanity, I'm going to bed.
You know... the first thing you find out in this city... is that if you want to go crazy... you have to have a very stable mind.
I've been trying to find some time to balance my... right thing for my family, club.
I thought it would be nice if we could keep a balance between your house and our house.
The secret is to strike the right balance between yielding and giving.
